Plot: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.
Title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
Writer: Gary K. Wolf (novel), Jeffrey Price (screenplay), Peter S. Seaman (screenplay)
Actors: Bob Hoskins, Christopher Lloyd, Joanna Cassidy, Charles Fleischer
tomatoConsensus: Who Framed Roger Rabbit is an innovative and entertaining film that features a groundbreaking mix of live action and animation, with a touching and original story to boot.
